column2: "You again? You wanted to show me something? I'd like something to bring my passion back."
"It's no use, I've already given up on-... that weapon... it can't be..."
"What is this!? In this state, it's completely useless... and yet, it all fits together."
"And this configuration, how does it work? Moreover, how does one make something like this!?"
"In the tundra, you say? But this... never mind, it's time for action, not questions!"
"Would you lend this broken piece to me? I may be able to restore it."
"Don't worry, I won't ask for any kind of payment!"
"Actually, quite the opposite. In return, I'll make a weapon for you!"
"This is only part of a broken weapon, and yet it has so much potential. I have to see its completed form!"
"My passion that had grown cold now burns brightly once again!"
"Ah-hahaha! I'm really looking forward to this!"
"You have a lot of potential yourself. I can't wait to see what comes!"
